item.title: A Simple Go Configuration
item.description: I use this same configuration structure and supporting functions in most every Go program I work on. It is pretty simple but makes it easy to keep global variables orgranized and configurable. Here is what I do: Create a type config struct Every configurable variable for the program becomes a Member field of the Configuration structure. Register every field of the Configuration Structure with go’s builtin flags package such that the flags are parsed when the program starts we can use our configuration variable.
